# Applied Causal Inference Tutorials 

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of these tutorials is to give students hands on deliberate practice with the basics of causal inference. 

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/JgfJrINqmg6dNw3qJ3/giphy.gif)

## Installation

You can install the released version of learncausalinfeRence from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("learncausalinfeRence")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("asteves/learncausalinfeRence")
```
